GameFrame - Class in view.gameview
 
GameFrame(Model, IController) - Constructor for class view.gameview.GameFrame
We create a Frame with parameters We put the Panel attentive to the events Prevent the creation of a shortcut bar at the top of the screen We put the title of the game on the Frame We put the Frame on the center of the screen We close the processus when we close the window We put the Frame on full screen We put the background in black We put the Panel on the center of the Frame We forbid resizing
